java.lang.Object

@groovy.transform.CompileStatic
@groovy.transform.Canonical(includes = ['group', 'name', 'version'])
class Dependency
extends java.lang.Object

Represents a dependency independent of any dependency resolution engine (ivy or aether)

Authors:
Graeme Rocher
